images.description: SDSS image of region near elliptical galaxy PGC 44832, which is probably NGC 4908, but is often called IC 4051. Also shown is PGC 44828, which is probably IC 4051, but is often called NGC 4908. Also shown are NGC 4906, IC 4040, 4041, 4042 and 4045
SDSS image of elliptical galaxy PGC 44832, which is probably NGC 4908, but is often called IC 4051
